description: Test your knowledge of movies, TV shows, celebrities, and entertainment trends

questions.question: Which TV series holds the record for most Emmy Awards won?
questions.funFact: Game of Thrones won 59 Emmy Awards out of 160 nominations!
questions.story: Game of Thrones revolutionized television with its epic scale and complex storytelling. The series finale was watched by 19.3 million viewers, making it HBO's most-watched episode ever. The show's success led to multiple spin-off series and changed how networks approach fantasy television.

questions.question: Who is the highest-grossing actor of all time?
questions.funFact: Samuel L. Jackson's films have grossed over $27 billion worldwide!
questions.story: Jackson's career spans over 150 films, with his role as Nick Fury in the Marvel Cinematic Universe significantly contributing to his box office success. He was originally inspired to become an actor after seeing the lack of diversity in movies while growing up during the Civil Rights Movement.

questions.question: Which social media platform launched in 2010 with square photos?
questions.funFact: Instagram's original name was 'Burbn' and it was meant to be a check-in app!
questions.story: Instagram's creators, Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger, originally developed Burbn, a location-sharing app. After noticing users were mainly sharing photos, they simplified the app to focus solely on photo sharing, leading to Instagram's creation and its iconic square format.
